Yeah, I didn't think it was the best idea to stick around and answer questions.
Well, then, since you answer my questions for a living, why don't I make it easy for you?
Would it be possible for me to give my answer in three or four days sir?
I'm not sure I can answer the question the way that you phrased it, sir.
And sooner or later, one must answer the question... what becomes of them?
Well, I certainly couldn't, you know, answer that question for him.
The one who can answer that question, is obviously not going to speak.
I think there is only one person on this ship who could answer that question.
I can't answer it because you're askin' the wrong question.

I can't answer that by talking, only by doing it.
